author: rickhall
msg: Applied a patch (FELIX-804) to add partial support for new service registry
hooks as proposed for OSGi R4.2; currently, only listener hooks are supported.

msg: [MNG-3838] Some POMs fail to parse if the are subject to ModelContainer joining
o Converted example POM provided by Espen Wiborg into IT

author: gsim
msg: Added further test script missing from distribution list and thus causing distcheck to fail if cluster module is enabled.
